term.title: hydrophilic

item.text: 'Water loving'. The capacity of a molecular entity or of a substituent to interact with polar solvents, in particular with water, or with other polar groups.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1123 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
